tool_description: Analyzes migration timing patterns including departure dates, arrival dates, duration, and seasonal variations from GPS tracking data.
error_messages: Array length mismatch: All input arrays must have the same length.
Insufficient data: Need at least 20 GPS fixes spanning multiple months for timing analysis.
Invalid breeding latitude: Must be between -90 and 90 degrees.
Invalid wintering latitude: Must be between -90 and 90 degrees.
Temporal coverage insufficient: Data must span at least 6 months for migration timing analysis.
No migration detected: Tracking data shows no clear migration patterns.
usage: Provide GPS tracking data arrays with at least 20 fixes spanning multiple months. Optionally provide breeding_latitude and wintering_latitude for enhanced analysis.

migration_duration_days.description: Duration of each detected migration period

timing_consistency.description: Assessment of timing consistency across seasons
